enhanced_description: Learn Tech is a learning design studio and L&D consultancy based in Gurgaon, India, specializing in creating innovative and effective learning solutions. They offer a wide range of digital services, including e-learning development, compliance training, and digital learning design and development. Their expertise extends to creating performance-oriented digital learning experiences with reporting available on mobile and desktops, as well as designing result-oriented and scalable workshop programs. A key offering is gamified learning, where content is converted into world-class games featuring challenges, obstacles, levels, progress-based scores, leaderboards, and immersive storylines. Learn Tech supports skill development, learning optimization, and skill acquisition, acting as consultants for corporate LMS and course authoring. Since 2009, they have delivered over 5000 hours of content, impacting over 100,000 professionals, and are recognized as one of the top 20 L&D consultants in India.
